title: Hex to ASCII
description:
Hexadecimal is base-16 numbering system commonly used in computing. Convert this hex string to ASCII text to reveal the flag:

`666c61677b6865785f746f5f61736369695f636f6e76657273696f6e7d`

**Hint:** Use an online hex to ASCII converter, or Python: `bytes.fromhex('...').decode('ascii')`
